Description: Define the overall vision and objectives of the product.
Create and prioritize the list of features
Plan major releases and map backlog items to releases.
Select backlog items for the sprint and define the sprint goal.
Short stand-up meeting to discuss progress
Merge code changes frequently and run automated tests.
Demonstrate completed work to stakeholders and gather feedback.
Reflect on the sprint process and identify improvements.
Finalize and stabilize code for release
Deploy the product increment to production.
Monitor system performance and user feedback post-release.
Review and reprioritize backlog items based on new insights.
